hello guys!
Is there a terminal command i can use to make sure my new nvidia drivers are installed ? I got help here last night and just finished the installation!
how can i make sure that my video cards drivers are installed ?
ok so how bout a link ?
nvidia card?
lsmod | grep nvidia
to see if the nvidia module is loaded
then if it is, open /etc/X11/xorg.conf in a text editor, and check the "Driver:" section
it should say "nvidia" there, not "nv"
do you get an nvidia splash screen when you start gnome?
should be up and running then
it might work with normal wine too, I'm not sure
